title: Workshop on Designing and Utilizing Math Education Video Subtitles

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and basic experience with educational tools
context.additional_context: Course focusing on developing caption design and utilization strategies for pre-service teachers creating math education videos, exploring practical solutions for classrooms through digital tools and PBL approaches

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three principles for designing appropriate subtitles for math educational videos.
A caption system can be implemented to enhance learning effectiveness by utilizing actual math lecture videos.
Inclusive caption production guidelines can be developed, considering students with hearing impairments and diverse learning environments.
Challenges arising from applying automated caption translation technology to math content can be analyzed, and improvement strategies proposed.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
